original_title: The Adventures of Sam Digital in the 21st Century
overview: Created by Nick Clarridge, a grade-six student from Toronto, Sam Digital is a 21st century computer virus detective in the year 2050. When a giant virus monster tries to destroy Internet World, everyone in the future can't do their daily activities, and Sam must go into the digital world to stop the virus once and for all.
title: The Adventures of Sam Digital in the 21st Century
